MAN.TITLE: log1p
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: computes with accuracy the natural logarithm of its argument added by one

DESCRIPTION.P: logp1(x) is the "element-wise" log(1+x) function. y(i,j)=log(1 + x(i,j)). This function, defined for x > -1, must be used if we want to compute log(1+x) with accuracy for |x| << 1.

ITEMIZE.label: EXAMPLES
ITEMIZE.VERBATIM: format("e",24) log(1.001) log1p(0.001) log(1 + 1.e-7) log1p(1.e-7) log(1 + 1.e-20) log1p(1.e-20) format("v") //reset default format
